00007 #ifndef MECAB_PARAM_H
00008 #define MECAB_PARAM_H
00009 
00010 #include <map>
00011 #include <string>
00012 #include <vector>
00013 #include <sstream>
00014 #include "scoped_ptr.h"
00015 #include "common.h"
00016 
00017 namespace {
00018 template <class Target, class Source>
00019 Target lexical_cast(Source arg) {
00020   std::stringstream interpreter;
00021   Target result;
00022   if (!(interpreter << arg) || !(interpreter >> result) ||
00023       !(interpreter >> std::ws).eof()) {
00024     MeCab::scoped_ptr<Target> r(new Target());  // return default value
00025     return *r;
00026   }
00027   return result;
00028 }
00029 
00030 template <>
00031 std::string lexical_cast<std::string, std::string>(std::string arg) {
00032   return arg;
00033 }
00034 }
00035 
00036 namespace MeCab {
00037 
00038 struct Option {
00039   const char *name;
00040   char        short_name;
00041   const char *default_value;
00042   const char *arg_description;
00043   const char *description;
00044 };
00045 
00046 class Param {
00047  private:
00048   std::map<std::string, std::string> conf_;
00049   std::vector<std::string>           rest_;
00050   std::string                        system_name_;
00051   std::string                        help_;
00052   std::string                        version_;
00053   whatlog                            what_;
00054 
00055  public:
00056   bool open(int argc,  char **argv, const Option *opt);
00057   bool open(const char *arg,  const Option *opt);
00058   bool load(const char *filename);
00059   void clear();
00060   const std::vector<std::string>& rest_args() const { return rest_; }
00061 
00062   const char* program_name() const { return system_name_.c_str(); }
00063   const char *what() { return what_.str(); }
00064   const char* help() const { return help_.c_str(); }
00065   const char* version() const { return version_.c_str(); }
00066   int help_version() const;
00067 
00068   template <class T>
00069   T get(const char *key) const {
00070     std::map<std::string, std::string>::const_iterator it = conf_.find(key);
00071     if (it == conf_.end()) {
00072       scoped_ptr<T> r(new T());
00073       return *r;
00074     }
00075     return lexical_cast<T, std::string>(it->second);
00076   }
00077 
00078   template <class T>
00079   void set(const char* key, const T &value,
00080            bool rewrite = true) {
00081     std::string key2 = std::string(key);
00082     if (rewrite || (!rewrite && conf_.find(key2) == conf_.end()))
00083       conf_[key2] = lexical_cast<std::string, T>(value);
00084   }
00085 
00086   void dump_config(std::ostream *os) const;
00087 
00088   explicit Param() {}
00089   virtual ~Param() {}
00090 };
00091 }
00092 
00093 #endif
